name: KeepItAlive_PostSubmission
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare, postsubmission version.

Original entry can be found here : https://thomaslebel.itch.io/keep-italive

LudumDare post : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/keep-it-alive-didnt-found-a-better-title-ah

Here's the changelog :

-Correctly added the A key to move left

- Increased player move speed

- Mana spark no longer pass through wall

- Added buttons to switch spells :)

Hope you guys enjoy it !
